data.title: CityBeat is Searching For Freelance Writers
data.meta_description: CityBeat is looking for experienced writers to cover food and dining, local music and arts and culture beats on a freelance basis.
data.text:
Are you obsessed with all things Cincinnati? Are you always raving to your friends about the newest restaurants, art exhibits and under-the-radar places in Cincinnati? Want to write about it? CityBeat is looking for experienced writers to cover food and dining, local music and arts and culture beats on a freelance basis.

Compensation: Pay is per story and based on length and depth of research/interviews.

Requirements: Applicants must be avid CityBeat readers and familiar with our style and voice, as well as the topics we cover as an alt weekly. Experience in writing and reporting for a publication(s) is appreciated, but not required. Other buzzwords and terms for desirable applicants: ethical, independent, self-starter, compassionate, curious, inspired by sharing local stories, skilled interviewer.

How to apply: Please send a resume and three recent clips to [email protected].

Stay connected with CityBeat. Subscribe to our newsletters, and follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Google News, Apple News and Reddit.
